full_text:
Page 1755
Re: Epstein arrival at MCC
From Ray Ormond
To Hugh Hurwitz
Date 2019/08/12 13:22
Subject: Re: Epstein arrival at MCC
Attachments: TEXT.htm, Ray Ormond.vcf
First line, spelled plans plans.
This is accurate from the information I have, unless Alison has additional information. Thanks
J. Ray Ormond
Regional Director
Northeast Region
215-521-[redacted]
>>> Hugh Hurwitz 8/12/2019 1:17 PM >>>
Please review for accuracy before I send to [redacted].
[redacted] here is a timeline of his arrival at the MCC:
7/6/19: Arrived at NYM (Saturday) in the Receiving and Discharge area. Moved by staff to general population (apparently USMS did not indicate that he was a high profile inmate and staff were unaware that he was coming so no plans had been established).
7/7/19: Warden identified him as high profile and moved him to Special Housing Unit due to his concerns for his personal safety in general population.
7/8/19: Upon return of Psych Svc Staff on Monday, he was moved to Psychology Observation for evaluation by Psych Svc Staff. This is NOT suicide watch and the system notes reflect suicide watch not warranted. He was under 24 hour observation during this time to assess his readiness to move to SHU.
7/10/19: Returned to SHU with cell mate. Remains until 7/23.
Page 9103
DOJ-OGR-00025780

Re: Epstein arrival at MCC
From Ray Ormond
To Hugh Hurwitz
Date 2019/08/12 13:22
Subject: Re: Epstein arrival at MCC
Attachments: TEXT.htm, Ray Ormond.vcf

First line, spelled plans plans.
This is accurate from the information I have, unless Alison has additional information. Thanks

J. Ray Ormond
Regional Director
Northeast Region
215-521-[redacted]

>>> Hugh Hurwitz 8/12/2019 1:17 PM >>>
Please review for accuracy before I send to [redacted].
[redacted] here is a timeline of his arrival at the MCC:

7/6/19: Arrived at NYM (Saturday) in the Receiving and Discharge area. Moved by staff to general population (apparently USMS did not indicate that he was a high profile inmate and staff were unaware that he was coming so no plans had been established).
7/7/19: Warden identified him as high profile and moved him to Special Housing Unit due to his concerns for his personal safety in general population.
7/8/19: Upon return of Psych Svc Staff on Monday, he was moved to Psychology Observation for evaluation by Psych Svc Staff. This is NOT suicide watch and the system notes reflect suicide watch not warranted. He was under 24 hour observation during this time to assess his readiness to move to SHU.
7/10/19: Returned to SHU with cell mate. Remains until 7/23.

additional_notes: The document appears to be an email discussing the arrival of Epstein at MCC. There are redactions in the text, indicated by [redacted]. The document is from page 1755 and has a corresponding page number 9103 at the bottom.
